name: Yasha
nutshell:
In a country very much like present-day Japan, governed by an emperor who rules with an iron fist, a dark disease known as "BT" is spreading out-of-control. All those infected with BT will be overtaken by an insatiable desire to kill.
The emperor charges a group of skilled men with the responsibility of eliminating all "BT carriers." Among them are two brothers with cursed blood running through their veins. Though they appear fearless, there is one thing even they seem to dread: the Yomizakura, a mark of death which serves as a chain binding them to their traumatic childhoods.

name: Legend of Phoenix
nutshell: In an accident, an indifferent genius 10 year old boy falls along side a comet into a dreamland. There, he lives with the dwarves who inhabit the planet, using his talent and power to practice and grow his skills. Not only does he master the unparalleled smelting and forging techniques of the dwarves, but he develops a new form of martial arts as well. Just as he settles down and seems to be living a peaceful life, the cruel desires of others appear…

name: Holders
nutshell: Roughly 50 years have passed after Thyr Luke Midre was destroyed during the war against the Holder of Death. History states that the Holder of Death is the enemy of humankind. But how accurate is that history?

name: Before Love Kills Me
nutshell: Being reborn ten years later, my childhood friends have become a ruthless businessman, a son of a rich family, and a superstar respectively. What is even more ridiculous is that I seem to be their first love from years ago?

name: Mob Psycho 100 – GOOD FEELING (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Reigen starts to find amiable companionship with Ekubo to his own surprise.

name: Ajisai*Planet
nutshell:
Room 102 is home to some airhead sisters.
Room 201 is shared by two polar opposites.
Room 202 is a modern girl's room in which a mysterious young lady is living.
With an elementary school student as their landlord, Ajisai Villa is in heartwarming full bloom every day!
Ramyun Scans is working on this.
Respect is needed. Happy reading!

name: Travelling Through the Universe's Flower
tags: Time Travel,Historical,Long Strip,Romance,Reverse Harem,Magic,Fantasy,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: I'm a renowned genius in the History Department of my college, but I can't believe that I've travelled back in time into the body of a princess whose country was defeated in war! Was my being a genius in history all for nothing?! And not only am I stuck in the past, I'm having an arranged marriage with the Westerners as well! Moreover, I'm being married off to a country that runs of magic and has severe gender inequality issues. But don't you dare underestimate me! You're looking down on me, a princess of a defeated country? Well, I'll show you who's the real expert here!

name: The Lord of Money
nutshell:
Cheon Joong Myung, the third son of the CEO of the fifth wealthiest corporation, Ji Gyoung Group.
And his assistant working under him, Seong Chang Ook.
While Seong Chang Ook tried to kill Cheon Joong Myung and cover it up as an accident,
Seong Chang Ook was accidentally electrocuted along with his boss.
That’s when they find themselves trapped in each other’s bodies…
“You want me to become a playboy Conglomerate the world has never seen before?”
“I’ll be opening the doors to hell if I do this”
This is the start of the endless march of Cheon Joong Myung, the Lord of Money.

Links:

Original Web Novel (Kakao)
Webtoon Trailer EN | KOR | JP

name: Shoujo Junrei
nutshell: Aiko moved to Tokyo out of an adoration for Shinonome Shion, a mangaka whose work touched her so greatly that she reveres them like a god. What she doesn't know is that Mao, her lonely, gloomy next door neighbor, is actually Shinonome-sensei herself. Their complicated relationship grows deeper as Mao tries to keep her identity a secret while struggling with the pedestal that Aiko has unknowingly put her on.

name: Places Where Girls Are
nutshell: Saudi Arabia, Morocco, India, and Japan. A series of short stories staring at "because she's a girl" of 10-year-old girls with different countries, religions, cultures, and values.

name: The Student Council President With a Huge Personality Gap
My Groom Is the King of Hell
nutshell: I fell in love with the King of Hell. Despite knowing that my love for him would bring calamity upon myself, I was drawn to him like a moth to a flame.

name: The Hunter
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Action,Long Strip,Romance,Martial Arts,Adventure,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Chen BeiMing was once a young and talented hunter of the Heavenly Alliance, until he got betrayed and murdered by The Five Lords. He gets resurrected into the past while having his memory intact and swears that he will get revenge on those who betrayed him. With the help of his battle sprite, he once ascends the road to become the strongest again…

name: No. 6 - My Sweet Sweet Darling! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: No. 6 dj - My Sweet Sweet Darling!

name: Desert Rose & Blazing Transfer Student - Blazing USA (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
An official doujinshi drawn and written by Kaoru Shintani under the pen name of 88 Night,
in collaboration with Kazuhiko Shimamoto, Noboru Takizawa's creator.
Part of a series of doujinshi where the CAT Division M teams or clashes with other action/seinen manga characters
including Gunsmith Cats pair and the Sukeban Deka heroine, usually developed in collaboration with their creators
(a notable exception being the first one Desert Rose vs Akihime where Shintani's characters
meet the heroine of his wife Saeki Kayono's josei manga; clearly the couple created it together)

name: Calling (Jeigun)
nutshell:
A red-hair witch impulsively purchases a boy and takes the boy home only to find out that she bought more than what she bargained for.
NOTE: It is unknown if it is either completed or discontinued.

name: Song of the Doll
nutshell: Lee Woo-hee was kidnapped and found under a plum tree with a faint memory of a man telling her, "I promise you that until the day we meet again, you will be reborn." After that incident, her father became protective and would only allow her to go from the house to the plum tree she loved. However, she would be allowed to venture into the village on the day of the new moon. One such day she meets a exorcist that warns her of a man dressed in black. Will she take this warning to heart? Or is it already too late…?

name: Salman
nutshell: The very inspiring and empowering story of a guy masturbating in the river who ends up with a half human half salmon son.

name: For You, My Beloved
nutshell: Aya and Hiromi are students at the same nursing school. Aya has known from a young age that she is a lesbian, and when she falls for Hiromi, the two of them end up becoming a couple. Thanks to Aya's influence, Hiromi begins to come out of her shell and stand up to her strict, controlling parents. However, her newfound rebellious streak could spell disaster for their relationship…

name: Tsuzure no leghorn
nutshell: A geologist exhausted by urban life travels to a city threatened by an imminent volcanic explosion, an abandoned and dangerous place.

name: Bleach - Hello,MrGH (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairings: Ichigo x Ishida x Shirosaki
Link:
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: Drunken Love
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Girls' Love,School Life,Web Comic
nutshell: 'Unnie… I really like you'. Those were the words that Fine Arts student, Shibi tells Yeju, her former teacher and current sunbae. Only having eyes for Yeju, she blurts out a drunken confession, and the two of them later spend the night together, but a rumour that a girl named Jay is trying to approach Yeju begins to circulate and reaches Shibi's ears, which complicates her love life. A romance between two art students that get intoxicated with drunken love commences.

name: King & Prince
nutshell: I, the "Prince", as haughty as my nickname might suggest, am actually still a virgin! And the only man who can falter my cool facade is the "King"…!! I wonder which of us will come up on top in the "Big Two" battle on campus!?

name: Kuroko no Basket - Ore ga Muro-chin de, Atsushi ga Ore de (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing : Murasakibara x Himuro

name: Wuming Qishi
nutshell: The Sun Knight is a man who has shining golden hair, sky blue eyes, a compassionate nature, and a brilliant smile. He is the spokesperson for the God of Light, the captain of the Twelve Holy Knights, and (some say) the man closest to perfection. Beneath the veneer of the Sun Knight, however, lies a very different sort of character…

name: I Don't Have Schizophrenia
nutshell: A student who’s known by others to be perfectly straight, is a corrupted man in private. During a test, he suddenly burst out in anger towards nothing, and his life became entangled with a top student who died young! Being shamelessly seduced and pestered by the top student all day, how can he study properly!

name: First Class Servant
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Action,Long Strip,Comedy,Martial Arts,Isekai,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
Have you ever seen a servant who is more arrogant than noble? Have you seen a servant who is more arrogant than a monk? Have you seen a servant who is more domineering than an emperor? Have you ever seen a servant who hooked up with her own lady? Have you ever seen a servant who is in trouble with the alluring city?
As a modern man, Xu Feng has always been intoxicated with wind and moon, and has become a dog and horse, but because of an accident, he has reborn into another world, and he has become a servant. Messing with Ms. Xiao's family, ganging up with the rich ladies, scourge thousands. Achieve a generation of family!

name: My Classmates Are All Very Strange
nutshell:
Liao Yuqing, who’s just an ordinary female high schooler, somehow bumps into a Prince Charming-like* student on her way to school?! At the same time, the highly anticipated foreign mad dog, pretty boy student, Ryan, finally meets the frightening Demon King—Chu Feng. Surrounded by these four people, an ordinary teenage girl and her eccentric schoolmates begin living an unordinary daily life.
T/N: "Prince Charming" literally translates to "White Horse Prince" in Chinese.

name: Nanami-san
nutshell: A One-shot by Kinome sensei.
